page.title: 03TIBBERTON POST OFFICE
page.content:
{LOCAL HISTORY}-Tibberton Post Office is the only one in the village.It was first built in its present place in 1939.Before then it was opposite the Bridge Inn.The present owners first managed the shop in 1977.
{TRADE}-The shop sells a variety of items such as stationery, cards, chemists products, confectionery, all kinds of food and dairy products.
{CUSTOM}-The shop receives most custom on Thursdays because of pensions and Sundays when only the shop is open.
{ATTITUDES}-The owners enjoy managing the shop because they get to meet people and sometimes customers like to confide in the owner who says she sometimes feels like an Agony Aunt.
